TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_sumamad_izaw_kiya_makasicay_a_niyazu', title = sumamad_izaw_kiya_makasicay_a_niyazu', year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/sumamad_izaw_kiya_makasicay_a_niyazu'} }

S.FORM: sumamad izaw kiya makasicay a niyazu',lumuwa,ma'pahay i cuwacuwa maazih tu.我nuzikuzan nu taku,izaw tahkal maazih kiya ma'desay mukanay tu tademaw atu aadupen a di'tu nu nanum,izaw kiya ma'desay a di'tu,uzuma satabaki sa ku laing malabalad. izaw kiya tatama a wawa,makudus adidi',mapidah,kalaangic,pangangan han nibaki niza ci pusi han.

somamad izaw kiya makasicay a niyazo',lomowa,ma'pahay i cowacowa maazih to.我nozikozan no tako,izaw tahkal maazih kiya ma'desay mokanay to tademaw ato aadopen a di'to no nanom,izaw kiya ma'desay a di'to,ozoma satabaki sa ko laing malabalad. izaw kiya tatama a wawa,makodos adidi',mapidah,kalaangic,pangangan han nibaki niza ci posi han.
